result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John L Bowie

records.addlTxt:
Defendant John L Bowie in court.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for John L Bowie.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for motion hearing on Defense Motion to Suppress.  Arguments placed on the record.  Motion hearing proceeded. 
Sworn for state: City of Oak Creek Police Officer Christopher Schuerman. Exhibit 1 received. 
State and Defense rest. Testimony closed. Closing arguments. 
Based on statements put forth by Court and parties, Court DENIED Defense motion. Case adjourned for Deferred Prosecution Agreement hearing, Branch 13. 
Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant John L Bowie not in court.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for John L Bowie.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Motion Hearing.
State informed the Court that the witness was not subpoenaed and requests an adjournment.
Defense does not object.
Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 13.
Motion hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant John L Bowie in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Nate Kristian McClure appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court orders stayed bench warrant cancelled due to defendant's appearance in Court. Defense requests motion hearing date. Defense to file motion by 08/05/2022. Any State response to be filed by 09/02/2022. Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 37.   All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Motion hearing scheduled for September 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Sam Obscherning in court.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means. Case in court for deferred prosecution agreement. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date.   Court ordered case adjourned for calendar call in Branch 37.  Calendar call scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant John L Bowie in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn on behalf of Sam Obsherning.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  John L Bowie appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests additional time to complete a TADD evaluation.  Case adjourned, Br. 37.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant John L Bowie in court.  Patrick T. Franken appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 37 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for John L Bowie
Current: 1121 W Keefe Avenue, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 03-23-2022)
Prior: 4245 North 52nd Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 3/23/22 @ 2p
